summary: Phase 2 Super Admin Configuration Architecture testing complete. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features working correctly. Super Admin can access /admin/config with all 5 tabs (Roles, Blue Sheet, LLM, UI, Integrations). Non-super-admin users correctly denied access.
passed_tests: Super Admin login (superadmin@salescommand.com / demo123) successful
Account Manager login (am1@salescommand.com / demo123) successful
CEO login (ceo@salescommand.com / demo123) successful
Super Admin can access /api/config/system endpoint
Account Manager correctly denied access to /api/config/system (403)
CEO correctly denied access to /api/config/system (403)
/api/config/roles returns all 8 roles with permission counts
CEO can view roles via /api/config/roles
/api/config/blue-sheet returns scoring elements and pipeline stages
Account Manager can view Blue Sheet config
/api/config/ui returns theme, colors, typography, branding settings
Any authenticated user can view UI config
/api/config/llm returns provider configuration and prompt templates
Account Manager correctly denied access to LLM config (403)
/api/config/integrations returns integration configurations
/api/config/user-permissions returns user's permissions
/api/config/user-config returns filtered configuration for user
Dashboard stats API still works for Account Manager
Kanban view API still works for Account Manager
Super Admin can access /admin/config page in frontend
System Config link visible in sidebar for Super Admin
All 5 configuration tabs present (Roles, Blue Sheet, LLM, UI, Integrations)
Roles & Permissions tab displays all 8 roles with permission counts
Blue Sheet Config tab shows scoring elements with editable weights
Blue Sheet Config tab shows pipeline stages with probability and color settings
AI/LLM Settings tab shows OpenAI provider with gpt-4o model
AI/LLM Settings tab shows editable prompt templates
UI & Branding tab shows app name, tagline, logo URL settings
UI & Branding tab shows theme mode selector (Light/Dark/System)
UI & Branding tab shows color palette with all colors
UI & Branding tab shows typography settings
Integrations tab shows Odoo ERP with Mocked status
Integrations tab shows Microsoft 365 with Mocked status
System Config link hidden from Account Manager sidebar
Account Manager shown Access Denied when navigating to /admin/config
Account Manager dashboard with Kanban board still works
seed_data_creation: Using existing seed data from previous iterations

mocked_integrations.note: Odoo ERP and Microsoft 365 integrations are MOCKED - settings pages exist but no actual data sync

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Super Admin Configuration Architecture is fully implemented and tested. All configuration endpoints work correctly with proper role-based access control. Super Admin has full access to system configuration. CEO can view roles but not full system config. Account Manager and other roles are correctly denied access to sensitive configuration endpoints. The configuration system stores defaults in MongoDB 'system_config' collection and initializes automatically on first access.
